title: Wicker Cat Bed Dome for Medium Indoor Cats - a Covered Cat Hideaway Hut of Faux Rattan Houses Pets in Dome Basket, Washable
description: Wicker material is washable and protects small cats in a enclosed dome basket of modern styles. So in term of beds or modern cat houses built with rattan for small to medium pets, you can expect the same durability and all weather endurance that's the very nature of patio furniture. D+ Garden medium wicker cat bed offers features that are essential to cat hideaway including bed mat and free scratch pad. In addition, Cat hut in eggshell shape can absorb impact directed at the dome basket.
1x Wicker Cat Bed, 1x Bed Mat, 1 Scratch Pad

Made of hand woven resin wicker that's used to build outdoor patio furniture and harmless to cat. Wicker surface is slick and scratch-resistant. Design of cat house is inspired by bird nest that includes hooded rim that gives pet better sheltering. Also wide cave opening makes it easier for small, medium indoor cats to walk in and arch their back.
Opening 13 in. at widest points - outside
Opening 13 in. at widest points - outside
Leg room 19 in. at widest points - inside
Leg room 19 in. at widest points - inside
Bed mat is provided with each cat bed and measures 14" Dia. thickness of 3.5"
Bed mat is provided with each cat bed and measures 14" Dia. thickness of 3.5"
Hide some catnip underneath the mat to allure cat into the bed and then start to interact.
